channel.title: pulumi on Matias Pan's blog
channel.description: Recent content in pulumi on Matias Pan's blog

item.title: Streamlining CI/CD with Dagger: Beyond YAML
item.description: Dagger is a new tool that promises to fix the yaml and custom scripts mess that CI/CD currently is by building pipelines as code with one of the supported SDKs. I’m in the process of learning this tool, understanding where it may fall short and where it shines and I decided that sharing some of the exploration I do and the learnings it leaves me would be useful. NOTE: Dagger is in very active development so by the time you read this blog post it might already be deprecated.
